review_data.title: Best Indian Restaurant in Zurich !
review_data.content: We have dined here 4 times recently. Outside seating in the summer, and indoor more recently. The food has been excellent each time. The madras, jalfrezi, and vindaloo are all full of flavour. The garlic naan is great. Helpful and attentive service ( thanks Mohit)...More

review_data.title: Decent Indian restaurant.

review_data.title: OK place to dine
review_data.content: Dinner here was fine. It is typical Indian. There were many vegan and vegetarian choices. Service was fine. We were there late at night for dinner, and the only ones there, so it was a very peaceful occasion.
